title: City of God
synopsis: Growing up in a Rio de Janeiro slum, Rocket is able to avoid being drawn into a life of drugs and crime by having a passion for photography.

title: The Mechanism
synopsis: A scandal erupts in Brazil during an investigation of alleged government corruption via oil and construction companies. Loosely inspired by true events.

title: Nothing to Lose
synopsis: This biographical drama traces the rise to fame of controversial Brazilian evangelical leader and business titan Edir Macedo.

title: Trash
synopsis: Three poor Brazilian teens find something suspicious in a garbage heap, then end up on the run from the law as they try to set things right.

title: Carandiru
synopsis: A doctor connects with the inmates at the severely overcrowded São Paulo House of Detention. But hostilities boil over, resulting in a fatal riot.
In a future where the elite inhabit an island paradise far from the crowded slums, you get one chance to join the 3% saved from squalor.

title: VIPs

title: Seashore
synopsis: When a man traveling to sort out some family business invites an old friend to accompany him, their longtime friendship takes an erotic turn.

synopsis: Three male friends navigate different stages of romantic relationships: One is starting to date; another fears infidelity; the third is divorcing.

synopsis: Manuel Henrique Pereira is one of Brazil's most famous practitioners of Capoeira, the dazzling mixture of martial arts and fluid dance moves.

synopsis: This film is based on the true story of a man who takes his wife and children on a 2,000-mile bicycle trip across Brazil in search of a decent job.

synopsis: In a crime-plagued area of Rio de Janeiro, a team of honest cops, including a determined rookie, fights corruption and mistrust on all sides.

title: O Concurso
synopsis: Four candidates for a federal judge position embark on a madcap, no-holds-barred race to outdo one another, each committing his own brand of mayhem.

synopsis: Maluquinho, a troublemaker with a heart of gold, visits his grandfather in the countryside, where he gets into all sorts of mischief and adventure.

title: Jules and Dolores
synopsis: In 1983, the World Cup trophy was stolen from the Brazilian Football Association's headquarters. This is the strange story behind that event.

synopsis: After a family trauma, Lucas Vidal devotes himself to fighting evil as a priest, but a terrifying exorcism pits him against the devil himself.

synopsis: After living as a man for nearly 60 years, Laerte Coutinho, one of Brazil's most brilliant cartoonists, introduces herself to the world as a woman.

synopsis: The most popular YouTubers in Brazil gather at a convention in a hotel, where eight comic, interrelated stories of fame in the internet age unfold.

title: Mundo Cao

synopsis: A group of friends finds their fun at vacation camp ruined when a big corporate developer threatens to build a pollution-spewing factory on the land.

title: O Último Cine Drive-in
synopsis: Upon returning home for the sake of his ill mother, a man reconnects with his estranged father, who still runs a drive-in on the brink of demolition.

synopsis: Two emotionally damaged people, one a 50-year-old man, the other a 25-year-old woman, begin to bond over their problems after a chance meeting.

synopsis: The eclectic children of World School get a chance to meet a famous pop star, but first their archenemies aim to put them through a grueling trial.

title: The Birth Reborn
synopsis: Mothers and medical professionals speak about their experiences with the increasingly controversial practice of Caesarean deliveries in Brazil.

title: Cidade Cinza
synopsis: When a city ordinance directs the removal of a beloved graffiti mural in São Paulo, artists and residents unite to protest and re-create the work.

synopsis: Her daughter afflicted by a rare epilepsy, Katiele tries desperately to obtain the only thing that can relieve it: a substance derived from marijuana.

title: 9mm: São Paulo
synopsis: A dedicated but underfunded team of São Paulo detectives try to solve a string of seemingly unrelated crimes, as well as their own personal issues.

title: Gosto Se Discute
synopsis: Faced with the arrival of a neighboring food truck and a bank auditor, the chef of a declining restaurant must create a new menu to save his business.

title: Juacas

title: ¿Qué Monstro te Mordeu?
synopsis: In a world where monsters drawn by children come to life, half-human Lali and her friends try to keep strange new creatures from running amok.

synopsis: This film chronicles the career of surfer Dadá Figueiredo, whose stormy personal life upended his status as a trendsetting '70s sports hero.

synopsis: A Brazilian man tries a myriad of ways to get over his breakup with his girlfriend but is surprised to learn it's more difficult than he anticipated.

title: Experimentos Extraordinários
synopsis: The producer of a television series about home-based experiments must get a show on the air each week with a cast of inexperienced teenagers.

title: Fala Comigo
synopsis: A bored teen phones his psychiatrist mother's female patients to elicit a thrill, but he suddenly finds himself making a real-life connection.

title: Historietas Assombradas: O Filme
synopsis: A boy goes on a journey to find his parents and must also try to rescue his grandmother, who has been kidnapped by an evil villain.

title: Quanto Tempo o Tempo Tem
synopsis: Experts explain how different civilizations throughout history have comprehended time, and why some of us never seem to have enough of it.

title: Barão Vermelho: Por que a gente é assim?
synopsis: Testimonies and footage chronicle Brazilian rock band Barão Vermelho's history, starting with its 1981 formation and fateful find in frontman Cazuza.

title: Horizonte B
synopsis: In the wake of their father's death, two brothers find a mysterious stone that fell from the sky and embark on a journey to uncover its secrets.

title: Anatomia do Crime
synopsis: This investigative series sheds new light on some of Brazil's most notorious crimes by analyzing forensic evidence, psychological triggers and more.

title: A Menina Índigo
synopsis: A young girl with a love of painting discovers she is able to heal people's illnesses with the touch of her hands.

title: Samantha!
synopsis: A child star in the '80s, Samantha clings to the fringes of celebrity with hilarious harebrained schemes to launch herself back into the spotlight.
